qpaper.instruction: * This test consists of MCQ questions only.<br/>* In case of practical questions, response has to be captured in form of video.<br/>* Once the test has started, do not press the back or exit button.<br/>* Once you press submit button, your responses will be submitted and graded simultaneously.<br/>* In case if test time gets over, your responses will automatically get saved and graded.<br/>* Once you have attempted the test and submitted your responses, you will not be able to take this test again.<br/>

question.sectionname: Section 1: N0001 Safety
question.text: N0001 Safety

parameter.text: 1. Selecting the correct Helmet as per colour for himself
2. Adjustment of helmet as per head size
3. Tieing of strap of the helmet and adjustment
4. Selection and identification of safety goggles as per task
5. Wearing of goggles
6. Identification of safety harness and wearing it
7. Wearing of safety shoes, check laces & tyiing
8. Identification and use of ear plugs
9. Identification & use of gloves as per trade and task
10. Identification and use of rings & hooks in safety belt

question.sectionname: Section 2: N0002 Tools
question.text: N0002 Tools

parameter.text: 1. Identification by name of tools
2. Selection for purpose right tool for right job
3. Identification of construction materials
4. Selection and use of material for various purpose
5. Handling techniques of the tools
6. Upkeep repair and maintenance of tools daily and periodical
7. Safety precautions while handling the tools
8. Storage of tools
9. Checking and testing of tools

question.sectionname: Section 3: N0003 Material Handling
question.text: N0003 Material Handling

parameter.text: 1. Method of Unloading Cement bag from Vehicle
2. Method of carrying the cement bag manually or by wheel barrow / trolley
3. Stacking of cement bags (check dunnage / platforms and arrangement of bags)
4. Lifting of cement bag manually (check method and body position)
5. Method of storing cement bags (check how to cover/ condition of storage area )
6. Method of weighing the cement bag (use of weigh and placing of bricks)
7. Method of unloading the sand and aggregate (opening of vehicles & removal process)
8. Method of stacking & storing the sand & aggregate
9. Arrangement & storing of water for the job (tank / bucket / tanker etc.)
10. Method of stacking of bricks / blocks/stones
11. Method of loading & unloading of bricks
12. Method of handling the bricks for soaking
13. Method of stacking the timber
14. Storing of paint & other inflammable material
15. Method of carrying and handling liquid material

question.sectionname: Section 4: N0004 - Preparation of Cement Mortar and Concrete Mix
question.text: N0004 - Preparation of Cement Mortar and Concrete Mix

parameter.text: 1. Proper mixing platform used
2. Bags properly cut and used
3. Empty gunny bags properly stored
4. Ingredients measured by using appropriate measurement box
5. Dry mixing of ingredients done properly
6. Portable water used
7. Pouring of water done in correct method and sequence
8. Mixing done properly (accurately, thoroughly and clearly)
9. Mixed mortar is not fat or lean
10. Mixed mortar is stored properly
11. Area kept clean
12. Color of mixed mortar is uniform
13. Move, place and operate the hand operated concrete mixture
14. Place and transport the concrete
15. Safe working methods

question.sectionname: Section 5: N0005 - Types of Bonds
question.text: N0005 - Types of Bonds

parameter.text: 1. Arrangement of materials
2. Marking of layout as per the bond
3. Set out 90 degree using building squre or 3-4-5 method
4. Lay brick in sequence as per the given bond (Heading / Stretcher
5. Placement of mortar in layers and joints for the brickwork
6. Check the spacing is regular in joint thickness
7. Check the level of top course
8. Check the Wall alignment
9. Check the wall verticality

question.sectionname: Section 6: N0006 - Erect and Dismantle of 3.6 meter
question.text: N0006 - Erect and Dismantle of 3.6 meter

parameter.text: 1. Identify tools & tackles as per the material used for scaffolding
2. Tools Inspection
3. Arrangement of materials
4.Use of all safety equipment
5. Base support and anchoring as per scaffolding such as pipe/bamboo/system
6. Scaffolding securing of joints (Types such as Coupler / Knots / Pins)
7. Sequence of the erection and dismantling as per the type of scaffolding
8. Diagonal support of the scaffolding
9. Verticality and level check
10. Drill for moving of material from ground to first landing / level of scaffolding

question.sectionname: Section 7: N00031 Cutting, filling and leveling
question.text: N0031 - Cutting, Filling and Leveling

parameter.text: 1. Identification and use of digging and excavating tools
2. Marking the layout on ground for cutting and filling of the earth
3. Cutting and digging the mark area up to desire depth manually
4. Taking out soil / mud from the pit by shovel manual
5. Carrying of earth manually in pan and by wheel barrow
6. Filling of earth (check shoveling, spread and required quantity)
7. Compaction of earth by damping and rolling manually
8. Use of hand roller (check the number of passes load required and moisture)
9. Digging in water filled area (methods to dewater)
10. Erecting and labeling / signage the safety parameter ribbon around the pit

qpaper.instruction: * This test consists of MCQ questions only.<br/>* In case of practical questions, response has to be captured in form of video.<br/>* Once the test has started, do not press the back or exit button.<br/>* Once you press submit button, your responses will be submitted and graded simultaneously.<br/>* In case if test time gets over, your responses will automatically get saved and graded.<br/>* Once you have attempted the test and submitted your responses, you will not be able to take this test again.<br/>

question.sectionname: Section 2: N0002 - Tools
question.text: Why is vibrator used for concrete works?<br>କଂକ୍ରିଟ୍‍ କାମ ପାଇଁ ଭାଇବ୍ରେଟର୍‍ କାହିଁକି ବ୍ୟବହାର କରାଯାଏ? <br />

option.text: For reducing air crack<br>ବାୟୁଜନିତ ଫାଟକୁ କମାଇବା ପାଇଁ

question.sectionname: Section 2: N0002 - Tools
question.text: Which of the following is used for holding door frames in position during masonry construction?<br>ସ୍ଥାପତ୍ୟ ନିର୍ମାଣ ସମୟରେ କବାଟ ଫ୍ରେମ୍‍ଗୁଡିକ ସେଗୁଡିକର ସ୍ଥାନରେ ଧରି ରଖିବା ପାଇଁ ନିମ୍ନ ମଧ୍ୟରୁ କେଉଁଟି ବ୍ୟବହାର କରାଯାଏ? <br />

question.sectionname: Section 2: N0002 - Tools
question.text: Name the tool used for ensuring that the door frames are straight and upright.<br>କବାଟ ଫ୍ରେମ୍‍ ସିଧା ଓ ଭୂଲମ୍ବ ଭାବେ ରହିଛି କି ନାହିଁ ତାହା ନିଶ୍ଚିତ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ଯେଉଁ ଯନ୍ତ୍ର ବ୍ୟବହାର କରାଯାଏ ତାହାର ନାମ କୁହନ୍ତୁ.

question.sectionname: Section 4: N0004 - Preparation of Cement Mortar and Concrete Mix
question.text: The average quantity of water required for making 1:6 mortar is ___________<br>୧:୬ ମୋର୍ଟାର୍‍ ତିଆରି କରିବା ପାଇଁ ହାରାହାରି _____ ପରିମାଣର ପାଣି ଆବଶ୍ୟକ

question.sectionname: Section 4: N0004 - Preparation of Cement Mortar and Concrete Mix
question.text: The raw materials used for brick masonry are ____<br>ଇଟା ସ୍ଥାପତ୍ୟଗୁଡିକରେ ବ୍ୟବହୃତ ହେଉଥିବା କଞ୍ଚାମାଲ୍‍ ଗୁଡିକ ହେଉଛି ____

option.text: Bricks, stones, concrete blocks, sand, cement, water (mortar)<br>ଇଟା, ଗୋଡି, କଂକ୍ରିଟ୍‍ ବ୍ଲକ୍‍, ବାଲି, ସିମେଣ୍ଟ, ପାଣି (ମୋର୍ଟାର୍‍)
Bricks, concrete blocks, sand, cement, water (mortar)<br>ଇଟା, କଂକ୍ରିଟ୍‍ ବ୍ଲକ୍‍, ବାଲି, ସିମେଣ୍ଟ, ପାଣି (ମୋର୍ଟାର୍‍)
Stones, sand, cement, water (mortar)<br>ଗୋଡି, ବାଲି, ସିମେଣ୍ଟ, ପାଣି (ମୋର୍ଟାର୍‍)
Stones, sand, cement, water (mortar), concrete blocks<br>ଗୋଡି, ବାଲି, ସିମେଣ୍ଟ, ପାଣି (ମୋର୍ଟାର୍‍), କଂକ୍ରିଟ୍‍ ବ୍ଲକ୍‍

question.sectionname: Section 4: N0004 - Preparation of Cement Mortar and Concrete Mix
question.text: State Yes or No: Cement older than 6 month is useful for plastering works.<br>ଠିକ୍‍ କି ଭୁଲ୍‍ କୁହନ୍ତି: ୬ ମାସରୁ ଅଧିକ ଦିନ ରହିଥିବା ସିମେଣ୍ଟ ପ୍ଲାଷ୍ଟର୍‍ କାମ ପାଇଁ ଭଲ. <br />

question.sectionname: Section 4: N0004 - Preparation of Cement Mortar and Concrete Mix
question.text: Increased water content will _______.<br>ଅଧିକ ପାଣି ଦେଲେ _____ ହେବ.

option.text: Increase the strength of Mortar<br>ମୋର୍ଟାର୍‍ର ଶକ୍ତି ବଢାଇବ

question.sectionname: Section 4: N0004 - Preparation of Cement Mortar and Concrete Mix
question.text: For getting good quality result the mortar should be prepared every ______<br>ଭଲ ଗୁଣବତ୍ତାର ଜିନିଷ ପାଇବା ପାଇଁ ମୋର୍ଟାର୍‍କୁ ପ୍ରତ୍ୟେକ ____ରେ ପ୍ରସ୍ତୁତ କରିବା ଆବଶ୍ୟକ

question.sectionname: Section 5: N0005 - Types of Bonds
question.text: Identify the minimum time required for curing plastering.<br>ପ୍ଲାଷ୍ଟର୍‍ ସଜାଡିବା ପାଇଁ ସର୍ବନିମ୍ନ କେତେ ସମୟ ଲାଗେ ଚିହ୍ନଟ କରନ୍ତୁ. <br />

question.sectionname: Section 6: N0006 - Erect and Dismantle of 3.6 meter
question.text: How are rods fixed in the wall to reinforce it?<br>କାନ୍ଥକୁ ସଶକ୍ତ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ସେଥିରେ ଛଡଗୁଡିକୁ କିପରି ଲଗାଯାଏ? <br />

option.text: By driving them in holes with the hammer<br>ସେଥିରେ ଥିବା ଗାତରେ ହାତୁଡି ସାହାଯ୍ୟରେ ଭିତରକୁ ଭର୍ତ୍ତି କରି<br />
By installing alongside the bricks<br>ଇଟା ସହ ସେଗୁଡିକୁ ଲଗାଇ
By fixing it with cement<br>ସିମେଣ୍ଟ ସହ ସେଗୁଡିକୁ ଲଗାଇ
By binding them with ropes<br>ଦଉଡି ସାହାଯ୍ୟରେ ଏହାକୁ ବାନ୍ଧି
